sentences: Joel Jaffe (born January 15, 1952), also known as J. Jaffe, is an American audio engineer, record producer, multi-instrumentalist, songwriter, and president and co-founder of Studio D Recording, Inc.
Joel Jaffe was born in Cleveland, Ohio, United States, to Jay and Dorothy (NÃ©e Watkins) Jaffe.
In high school he formed the band The Illusions, performing at dances and parties, then at nightclubs opening shows for such artists as The Four Tops, The Everly Brothers, and The O'Jays.
